displayClass module

Display Class

Display Class display the content of the specified file on screen.

class displayClass.displayWindow(root, filename=None)[source]

Bases: object

directory = './articles/'

Globally declared directory

editPressed()[source]

This opens the edit window whenever the edit button is clicked.

filename = 'wikipedia'

Default file to be displayed

getData()[source]

Fetches the data from the file to be displayed.

removePage()[source]

This function removes or deletes the specified file.

setTitle(fname=None)[source]

This function sets the title of the file by taking the filename as input. :Input:

fname

name of the file and title is set for it
